term.title: Bohr magneton

item.text: Electromagnetic fundamental physical constant: µB = e.ℏ/2me = 9.274 0154 (31) E-21 J T^-1 is the elementary charge, ℏ the Planck constant divided by 2π and m e the electron rest mass.
